channel.title: UK Biobank on MerrimanLab
channel.description: Recent content in UK Biobank on MerrimanLab

item.title: Working with UK Biobank
item.description: Load modules for processing VCFs These programs are usually all needed in order to do analysis with the UK Biobank genetic data. module load bgenix/bgenix-1.1.8 module load bcftools/bcftools-1.11 The format for most analysis will follow this conversion: bgen -> vcf -> bed/bim/fam (plink) Extract and convert from bgen to VCF Extract region or SNP This command will extract out a region from the bgen file and turn it into a vcf
